page.title: 07UNDER 10'S LEISURE IN HULL
page.content: Organised leisure activities such as Cubs and Brownies are enjoyed by sevens to nines for shared fun and games, pack holidays and trips. Competitions and badge earning are popular. Mums and Dads help by taking children to such clubs as karate,judo and tenpin bowling. Dance class is very important to some girls. Several football clubs cater for the boys and supporting Hull City and Hull F.C. is a family activity. Swimming is a popular family hobby usually at Haltemprice Sports Centre. Music, both playing and listening, is a more individual hobby,while collecting is a must for many-anything from stamps to rubbers, comics to dolls and thimbles. Most join clubs to be with friends but share their parents interests.
